entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , La Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
